T02D2705:74a-5: sngon du 'gro ba bsod nams kyi tshogs la //
T02D2705:74a-6: mdun gyi nam mkha' la rang gi bla ma dang
T02D2705:74a-7: 'jam dbyangs la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2705:74a-8: sems dpa' dpag tu med pa bzhugs par bsams la
T02D2705:74a-9: yan lag bdun pa rgyas par bya /
T02D2705:74a-10: de nas tshad med pa bzhi bsgom dngos po thams cad rmi lam lta bu'i blo nye bar gzhag /
T02D2705:74b-1: de nas dri bzangs kyi chus chag chag btab la
T02D2705:74b-2: stan bde ba'i steng du ting nge 'dzin skye ba
T02D2705:74b-3: dang mthun pa'i lus kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas
T02D2705:74b-4: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom ste /
T02D2705:74b-6: sva bh'a ba la sogs kyang brjod do //
T02D2705:74b-7: de las skyo bar gyur na gang du yang ma
T02D2705:74b-8: grub pa'i ngang las rang gi sngar gyi gdan gang
T02D2705:74b-9: na yod pa'i sar aa dkar po yongs su gyur
T02D2705:74b-10: pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du yi
T02D2705:74b-11: ge dh'i: 'od kyi phung po rab tu 'bar bsams
T02D2705:74b-12: la de las 'od zer 'phros pas phyi rol gyi
T02D2705:74b-13: snod dang / nang bcud gyi dngos po gang la phog pa rnams 'phags par gyur /
T02D2705:74b-14: de rnams 'od zer gyis dh'i: la bsdu /
T02D2705:74b-15: de yongs su gyur pa las 'phags pa sku mdog dkar po //
T02D2705:74b-16: zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa /
T02D2705:74b-18: g-yon gyis thugs kar pu sti bzung ba /
T02D2705:74b-19: zhal cung zad 'dzum pa padma kha byed ba lta bu'i spyan dkyus ring ba /
T02D2705:74b-20: dbu la gtsug phud lnga 'phyang ba /
T02D2705:74b-21: rin po che'i rgyan mang po mdzes pa /
T02D2705:74b-22: bcu drug lon pa'i khye'u ltar gzhon sha dang bcas
T02D2705:74b-23: pa zla ba bye ba'i gzi brjid ltar 'od zer
T02D2705:74b-24: rab tu 'bar ba'i sku bskyed de /
T02D2705:74b-25: de'i thugs kar aom 'od zer gyi phung po can
T02D2705:74b-26: yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa
T02D2705:74b-27: kha dog shin tu dkar zhing 'od zer dpag tu
T02D2705:74b-29: de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dbus su aam yongs su gyur pa las 'jam dbyangs /
T02D2705:74b-30: shar du ram yongs su gyur pa las dra ba can gyi 'od //
T02D2705:74b-31: rgyab tu pam yongs su gyur pa las zla 'od /
T02D2705:74b-32: g-yas su cam tsam yongs su gyur pa las skra can ma /
T02D2705:74b-33: g-yon du nam yongs su gyur pa las nye ba'i skra can ma'o //
T02D2705:74b-34: 'di dag gi sku mdog phyag mtshan ni phyi rol gyi 'phags pa bzhin no //
T02D2705:74b-35: sku phyi nang thams cad dri ma yongs su dag
T02D2705:74b-36: cing 'od zer 'phros pas ma rig pa'i rdzab bsal
T02D2705:74b-37: bar bsam / g-yo ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2705:74b-38: 'khor lo de g-yo zhing 'khor bas rdza mkhan gyi
T02D2705:74b-39: 'khor lo ltar rab tu 'khor bas ma rig pa
T02D2705:74b-40: la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams gcod par byed
T02D2705:74b-41: do // ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang /
T02D2705:74b-44: rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan pa ni gzhan dang mthun no //
T02D2705:75a-0: @75a * // lha'i sku dri ma yongs su dag pa 'ja' tshon lta bu la dmigs la /
T02D2705:75a-1: aom aa ra pa tsa na dh'i: zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas so //
T02D2705:75a-2: 'di'i bsnyen pa'i tshad ni yi ge re re la 'bum tsho re re yin no //
T02D2705:75a-3: 'grub pa'i dus ni rgyun mi 'chad pa dang gus pa'i sgo nas bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2705:75a-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal g-yo ba'i 'khor lo'i man ngag
T02D2705:75a-5: / kha che'i pandi ta sh'akya shr'i bha dra'i zhal
